'''Surveyor&#39;s Breakfast Sandwich''' is a [[:Category:Special Dishes|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich]] with [[Mika]]. The [[recipe]] for Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich is available from [[Hertha]] for reaching [[Reputation]] level 4 in [[Mondstadt]].
